fault_addresses.context: Data reference in main.o rdata section
fault_addresses.probable_cause: null pointer dereference or uninitialized data structure access

fault_addresses.context: Early data reference in main.o rdata section
fault_addresses.probable_cause: early startup data structure access before initialization

analysis.likely_root_cause: STARTUP_DATA_FAULT - accessing data structures before proper initialization
recommended_guards: Insert null pointer checks before struct member access
Add early logging in main function to trace initialization order
Verify DirectDraw/graphics context initialization before use
